customer_needs: The product should fully adhere to CPSC safety standards to ensure reliability and regain consumer trust.
The product should improve positional stability during use and provide effective impact resistance to prevent head injuries.
The product should feature understandable impact labeling and safety features, along with transparency regarding certifications and compliance.
The product should have an adjustable design for a secure and comfortable fit, and be made from lightweight materials for ease of use.
The product should utilize high-quality, durable materials and be designed to accommodate growth for long-term use.
